head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BEAULAC, CATHERINE H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BEAULAC, CATHERINE H.

block.p: BEAULAC-Catherine H. On September 25, 2000. Of Washington, D.C. Beloved wife of the late Honorable Willard L. Beaulac. Mother of Noel Peters of Bowie, Maryland, Joan Zachor of Lexington, Mass., Anna Beaulac-Bonneau of Ft. Worth, Texas and Lee Beaulac of Naples, NY. Also survived by 13 grandchildren and 1 great-grandson. Friends may call at Joseph Gawlers Sons Funeral Directors, 5130 Wisconsin Avenue at Harrison Street NW on Tuesday,September 26 from 7pm-9pm. Mass of Christian burial will be offered at Church of the Annunciation, 3810 Massachusetts Avenue, NW, Washington, D.C. on Wednesday, September 27 at 10am. Interment Rock Creek cemetery. Memorial contributions may be made Hospice of Washington, 3720 Upton Street, NW, Washington, D.C. 20016.
